OPTIONS.IN_FUTURE: The feature will be available in the future

COMMON.SUBCATEGORY_DIALOG_DESC: Select the subcategories you are interested in, the selection of which can generate inspiration.
COMMON.RANDOM_SUBCATEGORY_TIP: Random subcategory - the image will be generated based on the general label: {{tag}}

STANDARD_MODE.SUB_TITLE: Standard module - get inspired by what you see.
STANDARD_MODE.DESCRIPTION: Choose the categories you are interested in. Based on them, the theme of your creative work will be generated. Draw, paint, sculpt!

PAGE_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Page not found
PAGE_NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: Sorry, we can't find the page you are interested in.
